features.title: Project Features
features.subtitle: What makes the MemeFish Army unique?
features.item1_desc: From classic rage comics to blockchain jokes, each fish is a carefully crafted tribute to internet subcultures.
features.item2_desc: Generative art based on layered PSDs, ensuring each combination is unique and visually appealing, with rare luminous variations.
features.item3_desc: User-minted NFTs are non-transferable, creating a true collection of loyal members and enhancing community identity.

roadmap.title: Development Roadmap
roadmap.subtitle: Our journey into the future of the internet's fish tank.
roadmap.phase1_desc: Launch the official website and minting DApp. Build the core community through whitelisting and airdrops.
roadmap.phase2_desc: Launch Discord holder-exclusive channels. Host community events and meme creation contests.
roadmap.phase3_desc: Explore collaborations with other meme projects. Develop staking or other utilities for Airdrop Fish.
roadmap.phase4_desc: Plan and develop a virtual space where holders can display their MemeFish. To the Moon!

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know.
faq.a1: It's a collection of 5000 unique, generative ERC-1155 NFTs based on internet meme culture, deployed on the Binance Smart Chain.
faq.a2: It means the NFTs you mint (Token ID > 500) cannot be transferred or sold. They are permanently bound to your wallet as a proof of your early support.
faq.q3: How can I get on the whitelist?
faq.a3: Stay active in our community! Follow our Twitter and join our Discord for announcements on whitelist opportunities and events.
faq.a4: The mint is currently free for whitelisted users, you only need to pay the gas fee on the BSC network.
